DOC.brief_summary: Two dos metformin 12 hour interval - low dose group ( 375/250 mg ) - high dose group ( 1000/1000mg )
DOC.detailed_description: A study evaluate compare pharmacokinetic-pharmacodynamic relationship different metformin dose group .
DOC.criteria: Age 20 45 Body weight 50 100 kg fast serum glucose 70 125 mg/dL provide inform consent voluntarily significant renal , gastrointestinal , hepatic , metabolic condition co/prior medication within 14 day study drug administration
